product_name: The North Face Katie Sling - Women's
long_description: The North Face Katie Sling makes a great everyday errand bag. It has an internal sleeve for your tablet and is made of waterproof fabric to help keep your valuables dry. Neoprene sleeve pads a tablet; two external zippered pockets secure smaller items. Adjustable sling shoulder strap lets you wear the bag comfortably; two quick-release buckles secure the top. Polyester fabric with polyurethane coating fends off unexpected rain showers. The North Face Katie Sling also features internal organization for pens, USB thumb drives and more.
short_description: The North Face Katie Sling makes a great everyday errand bag. It has an internal sleeve for your tablet and is made of waterproof fabric to help keep your valuables dry.
